scripts.day2: clear & kill -9 `lsof -i tcp:1234` & node --harmony day2/app.js & lt --subdomain ryanwx --port 1234
scripts.day3: clear & kill -9 `lsof -i tcp:1234` & node --harmony day3/app.js & lt --subdomain ryanwx --port 1234
scripts.day-p: clear & kill -9 `lsof -i tcp:1234` & pm2 start day3/app.js -i 1 & lt --subdomain ryanwx --port 1234
